#Setup directory paths
SET(ROOT ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})
SET(HEADERS ${ROOT}/headers)
SET(SOURCES ${ROOT}/sources)

#Initiate source files
FILE(GLOB ECHONEST_HEADERS ${HEADERS}/*.h)
FILE(GLOB ECHONEST_SOURCES ${SOURCES}/*.cxx)

#Create library
ADD_LIBRARY(echonest SHARED ${ECHONEST_HEADERS} ${ECHONEST_SOURCES})
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(echonest PROPERTIES LINKER_LANGUAGE C)

#Install file
INSTALL(TARGETS echonest DESTINATION external/echonest)
